attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Shed Skin
attacks.effect: Heal 40 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Bye-Bye Heal
attacks.effect: Heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. Shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck.

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Poison Powder
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Stinky Scent
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Disgusting Pollen
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your opponent’s Basic Pokémon can’t attack.

attacks.name: Downer Shock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep. If tails, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Bind Down
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Giga Drain
attacks.effect: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crosswise Whip
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Comet Punch
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.

attacks.name: Pitch
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Leaf Supply
attacks.effect: You may attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Bubble Net
attacks.effect: Energy can’t be attached to the Defending Pokémon from your opponent’s hand during their next turn.

abilities.name: Wimp Out
abilities.effect: During your first turn, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: First Impression
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokémon this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Armor Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Crossing Cut GX
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Crimson Storm
attacks.effect: Discard 3 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raging Out GX
attacks.effect: Discard the top 10 cards of your opponent’s deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Sacred Fire
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Phoenix Burn
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can’t use Phoenix Burn during your next turn.

attacks.name: Eternal Flame GX
attacks.effect: Put 3 in any combination of Fire Pokémon-GX or Fire Pokémon-EX from your discard pile onto your Bench. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Flare Recharge
attacks.effect: Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Odor Sleuth
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Diabolical Claws
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage for each Prize card you have taken.

attacks.name: Queen’s Haze GX
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Flame Cloak
attacks.effect: Attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Powder Snow
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Hydro Shot

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Evoshock

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon has any Water Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s maximum HP is 100 or more, this attack does nothing.

attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage for each Colorless in your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s Retreat Cost.

cards.effect: The Stage 1 Pokémon this card is attached to gets +40 HP.

cards.name: Escape Rope
cards.effect: Each player switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon. Your opponent switches first. (If a player does not have a Benched Pokémon, that player doesn’t switch Pokémon.)

cards.name: Guzma
cards.effect: Switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. If you do, switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Kiawe
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 4 Fire Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. Your turn ends.

cards.effect: Switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. If you do, switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Kiawe
cards.effect: Search your deck for up to 4 Fire Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. Your turn ends.

cards.name: Plumeria
cards.effect: Discard 2 cards from your hand. If you do, discard an Energy from 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

cards.name: Sophocles
cards.effect: Discard 2 cards from your hand. If you do, draw 4 cards.

cards.name: Wicke
cards.effect: Each player counts the cards in their hand, shuffles those cards into their deck, then draws that many cards.

attacks.name: First Impression
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokémon this turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Armor Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 20 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Crossing Cut GX
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Nature’s Judgment
attacks.effect: You may discard all Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Tapu Wilderness GX
attacks.effect: Heal all damage from this Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Crimson Storm
attacks.effect: Discard 3 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Raging Out GX
attacks.effect: Discard the top 10 cards of your opponent’s deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Diabolical Claws
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage for each Prize card you have taken.

attacks.name: Queen’s Haze GX
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Aqua Ring
attacks.effect: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hydro Shot
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Water Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Tapu Storm GX
attacks.effect: Shuffle your opponent’s Active Pokémon and all cards attached to it into their deck. If your opponent has no Benched Pokémon, this attack does nothing. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Light’s End
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Colorless Pokémon.

attacks.name: Prismatic Burst
attacks.effect: Discard all Psychic Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 60 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Black Ray GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 100 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon-GX and Pokémon-EX. This damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Cross-Cut
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Bedrock Breaker
attacks.effect: Discard any Stadium card in play.

attacks.name: Muscle Punch GX
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lycanfang GX
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Shadow Hunt
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can use the attacks of any Basic Pokémon in your discard pile. (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)

attacks.name: Peerless Hundred Blows GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage times the amount of basic Energy attached to this Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Chemical Breath
attacks.effect: This attack does 70 more damage for each Special Condition affecting your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tri Hazard GX
attacks.effect: Switch 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. The new Active Pokémon is now Burned, Paralyzed, and Poisoned. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Restoration
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is in your discard pile, you may put it onto your Bench. Then, attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dark Cleave
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance.

attacks.name: Dead End GX
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, that Pokémon is Knocked Out. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

abilities.name: Secret Spring
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fairy Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Infinite Force
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Energy attached to both Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Twilight GX
attacks.effect: Shuffle 10 cards from your discard pile into your deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

attacks.name: Distort
attacks.effect: Your opponent can’t play any Item cards from their hand during their next turn.

attacks.name: Sonic Volume
attacks.effect: Your opponent can’t play any Special Energy cards from their hand during their next turn.

attacks.name: Boomburst GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

cards.name: Bodybuilding Dumbbells
cards.effect: The Stage 1 Pokémon this card is attached to gets +40 HP.

cards.name: Choice Band
cards.effect: The attacks of the Pokémon this card is attached to do 30 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon-GX or Active Pokémon-EX (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Escape Rope
cards.effect: Each player switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon. Your opponent switches first. (If a player does not have a Benched Pokémon, that player doesn’t switch Pokémon.)

cards.name: Multi Switch
cards.effect: Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Rescue Stretcher
cards.effect: Choose 1:•Put a Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.•Shuffle 3 Pokémon from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Super Scoop Up
cards.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your hand.
